title: Sonic Weapon Attacks in Cuba - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/28/17
itunes:title: Sonic Weapon Attacks in Cuba - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/28/17
description:
George Noory and medical sociologist Dr. Robert Bartholomew analyze the recent attacks on American diplomats in Cuba, and whether the health symptoms could be caused by new sonic weapons.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
